simplesect.title: NAME
simplesect.simpara: git-sh-i18n - Git's i18n setup code for shell scripts

simplesect.title: DESCRIPTION
simplesect.simpara: This is not a command the end user would want to run. Ever. This documentation is meant for people who are studying the Porcelain-ish scripts and/or are writing new ones.

The 'git sh-i18n scriptlet is designed to be sourced (using .) by Git's porcelain programs implemented in shell script. It provides wrappers for the GNU gettext and eval_gettext functions accessible through the gettext.sh script, and provides pass-through fallbacks on systems without GNU gettext.

listitem.simpara: Currently a dummy fall-through function implemented as a wrapper around printf(1). Will be replaced by a real gettext implementation in a later version.
Currently a dummy fall-through function implemented as a wrapper around printf(1) with variables expanded by the helper. Will be replaced by a real gettext implementation in a later version.
